title: Constant reminder  that Cassiopeia needs another rework
body: Where she doesn't get oom after casting 2 Qs and 4Es and where she has a more poison/snake identity. Also a new skin will be very much welcome, a Katarina/Cassiopeia shared theme skin is so damn needed, they are THE noxian sisters, come on. Cassio never forget {{champion:69}} {{item:3070}} .
